      • body

        public Response body​(java.lang.Object data,
                     java.lang.String contentType)
        Description copied from interface: Response
        Defines the request content to be sent back to the client, along with its content-type. Multipart responses may be specified using this method; however, the content-type will need to specify the boundary string and the boundary will need to be specified in the MultipartContent configuration as well.
        Specified by:
        body in interface Response
        Parameters:
        data - the content object
        contentType - the content type
        Returns:
        this response

      • getCookies

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> getCookies()
        Description copied from interface: Response
        Used to retrieve the configured response cookies. The map keys will be the cookie names, while the values will be either the cookie value as as String, or a Cookie object.
        Specified by:
        getCookies in interface Response
        Returns:
        the response cookies

      • getContent

        public byte[] getContent()
        Description copied from interface: Response
        Used to retrieve the configured response content. The content will be converted to a byte array based on the encoder configured for the content-type and content object type; if no encoder is found, the toString() method will be called on the content object and its bytes will be used.

        If no content exists, an empty array will be returned.

        Specified by:
        getContent in interface Response
        Returns:
        the response content (encoded)

        Returns:
        the response code

        public Response encoder​(java.lang.String contentType,
                        java.lang.Class objectType,
                        java.util.function.Function<java.lang.Object,​byte[]> encoder)
        Description copied from interface: Response
        Registers a response body encoder for this response, which will override any matching encoders configured globally (or shared).

        param contentType the response content-type to be encoded

        Specified by:
        encoder in interface Response
        Parameters:
        contentType - the response content type to be encoded
        objectType - the response object type to be encoded
        encoder - the encoder function
        Returns:
        a reference to this response configuration

      • encoders

        public Response encoders​(ResponseEncoders encoders)
        Description copied from interface: Response
        Registers the collection of shared encoders. Encoders registered on the response itself, will override these, but the shared encoders will override any matching global encoders.
        Specified by:
        encoders in interface Response
        Parameters:
        encoders - the shared encoders to be applied
        Returns:
        a reference to this response configuration
